original_text: As she was having even more pain, the woman who was helping her said, ‘Do not be afraid. You have another son!’
korean_text: 그가 난산할 즈음에 산파가 그에게 이르되 두려워하지 말라 지금 네가 또 득남하느니라 하매

sentences.original_text: As she was having even more pain
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 더 심한 고통을 겪고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: the woman who was helping her said
